description:
Fuchi Ryouhei was a male witch and warlock who had water-controlling abilities. He ambushed http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Wakatsuki Nico] and her friends who were having fun in the river at the time.
He was defeated by http://anidb.net/ch149328 [Kiryuu Miharu] and then had his power stripped with the help of Nico.
name: Fuchi Ryouhei
